description:
Now available for the first time, all GLBasic commands can now be referenced from your device, which is handy if you don't a computer nearby.

Operation is simple - you can either select a command from the all available category (as there are quite a few, the list can take a second to build up), or from one of the other 21 categories, which include 2D graphics, 3D graphics, and Program control.

Once selected, all the details for that command will be displayed.

The program isn't designed to look particularly good,  but one thing it does have going for it is that no internet or mobile connection is needed as the database is included in the program.
versionNote:
Update vertical size of drop-down buttons
Increase gap in list of keywords
Add in the commands new to GLBasic V10
